name: Unreal PlayStation Demo
description:
(Soon to be) a collection of demos in the style of the classic Unofficial PlayStation demo discs a lot of us used to play when we were younger.

Currently, only Heir's Sword is available to play, however more will be coming in the following months. I would love to spoil what's coming, but I'll save the teasing for when I'm ready to release more. This is a solo project, so things may be a little slow. 

Game Descriptions Heir's Sword

Rise up against your own bloodline. Navigate the cruel treacherous labyrinth populated by all manner of creatures, take down your foes with the weapon bestowed upon you by the very father you are destined to destroy and claim your right as king of the land.

Controls Menu   KB+M   PS  Xbox CONFIRM  Space  Cross  A BACK  Esc  Circle  B Heir's Sword   KB+M   PS  Xbox MOVE  WASD  D-Pad/Left Analogue  D-Pad/Left Analogue JUMP  Space  Triangle  Y ATTACK  LMB  Cross  A INTERACT  F  Square  X POTIONS  Q  Circle  B MOVE CAMERA  Mouse  R1/L1/Right Analogue  RB/LB/Right Analogue PAUSE  Esc Start  Start QUIT DEMO  Home + End  Start + Select  Start + Back Recommendations

If possible, play this with a controller. KM+B will work just fine, but where's the fun in that. :(

If you plan to play this on a CRT monitor, there is an extra ini setting you will likely require. If you go to \UPSXD\Config\DefaultGame.ini and scroll to the bottom, you will find a setting called CRTMode. If you set this to true, the pixelation post process will be disabled.

If this is your first time running a game made in Unreal Engine, please go to \Engine\Extras\Redist\en-us for an exe that will install anything required by the engine to run.
